descriptionHtml:
LOTR WEATHER TOP MOD

INTRODUCTION:

This Mod is for all the Skyrim and Lotr Fans and it changes
the scenario from the Ritual Stone in Skyrim into a version
inspired on Wheater Top from Lotr where Frodo gets stabed by
the Morgul Blade.
The mod only changes the architectural aspect of Ritual Stone 
spot, all the other features of the vanilla game are untouched.

If you are a Lotr Rings fan i think you will really like this
simple mod; beacause it brings a little bit of Middle Earth to
Skyrim.
I Hope all of you fans enjoy this mod and please comment and tell
if you like how it looks or if it should have anyother changes and
don\'t forget to endorse.

INSTALLING:

Installing this mod is very easy; just place the Data folder with
the WheaterTop.esp file in you Skyrim folder and check if the file
is active on the data files menu or in your Mod Mannager.
author: Sergeynest
